thumb.title: Altawil Law Group
thumb.description: Welcome to Altawil Law Group, where experience meets personalized representation, and your best interests are our top priority. As a premier legal firm specializing in Criminal Defense, Family Law, and Disciplinary Issues, we bring over 30 years of combined expertise to every case we handle. But we understand that experience alone is not enough; what sets us apart is our unwavering commitment to being your trusted advisor and advocate throughout your legal journey. When you choose Altawil Law Group, you're choosing more than just legal representation you're choosing a trusted ally and advocate who will stand by your side every step of the way.Altawil Law Group169 E Flagler St, STE 700, Miami, FL 33131, United States786-706-8802https://thepathtojustice.com/
